issue.title: Clean up/Delete error log
issue.body:
**Original author :** Larsen de Martino Jorgen

The newly committed code saves pictures from WMS and WMTS reponses if the service returns an error.

The database and with that the hard drive can very fast be over flooded with data.

I suggest that a delete button is placed under the tab 'Maintenance'

It would be nice to be able to: 
# to select a date range to delete 
# to set an auto delete that keeps a specified period in the database at all times
# to specify how often the auto delete should run

And maybe more - please fill in

I for one would be happy when the first bullet is done

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Hi Jorgen,

Good idea ! It extend the current log maintenance options.

If we add an "auto delete" option, I would suggest to made it available as well for the log (so far, it's done manually -> as you suggest in your point 1.)

Hum... I am wondering as well if logs and pictures should not be managed all together ?
Is there any need to keep logs longer in the databse than the pictures ?? for space issues I guess...

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

This is an old and very specific ticket & the community plans to make a large MONITOR refactoring.

Therefore, this ticket is rejected.
